title: Does Dirt Underneath Fingernails impact Ghusl or Wudu? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: NAA from the UK alayum If there is dirt in our nails must we remove the dirt from our nails before or the dirt that is underneath your nails does not impact your or your W but of course hygienically speaking it's best that you keep your nails according to the Sunnah always short and clean but it has no impact on the validity of that
